



=====================================================================================================================================================================================================================
Below is the PME 2.0 Mainline Trunk, most of which began as a new project. For over a year I intiated a "Code Freeze".  Any bugs on the live site had to be fixed in 2 places.  "Branch Merging wasn't possible.
=====================================================================================================================================================================================================================

2004-02-04 02:00  brian_cvs

	* printsmadeeasy/web/: ad_credticard_errors.php,
	  library/general_library.php: Now when an order is completed... it
	  will not necessarily capture the funds.  The problem is that we
	  have many orders in the system before the DB conversion that do
	  not have Previous Auth & Captures...	So for the existing open
	  orders we put an entry in the charges table of "B" both
	  authorized and Captures... that way the system knows not to try
	  to capture fund when it finally gets completed.
